mutants.code:
import re

def extractArticles(htmlContent):
    articles = re.findall('', htmlContent, re.DOTALL)
    extracted_articles = [{'title': title, 'content': content} for (title, content) in articles]
    return extracted_articles

mutants.original_line: extracted_articles = [{'title': title, 'content': content} for title, content in articles]
mutants.mutated_line: extracted_articles = [{'': title, 'content': content} for (title, content) in articles]
